```{r}
co2_data <- read.csv("./data/co2_emissions_tonnes_per_person_gapminder.csv")
```


```{r}
co2_report <- function(country, year){
  co2_data <- read.csv("./data/co2_emissions_tonnes_per_person_gapminder.csv")
  co2_data <- co2_data[co2_data$country %in% country, ]
  return(co2_data$year)
}
```

```{r}
co2_report(country = "Germany", year = X2001)
```
